summary: The implementation covers most core requirements for the Arcade Arena gaming website, including Internet Identity authentication, backend data models in Motoko, four playable games (Snake, Tic Tac Toe, Memory Card, Number Guessing), Friends system, Leaderboard, Profile, and responsive navigation. However, several requirements have gaps or missing implementations, particularly around weekly leaderboards, profile editing, friend relationship bidirectionality, and some UI elements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend provides methods to update user profiles
missing_requirements.reason: The backend main.mo file does not include a method to update existing user profiles. The registerUser method only creates new profiles, and there is no updateProfile or similar method implemented.

The addFriend method in backend only adds the friend to the caller's list, but does not reciprocally add the caller to the friend's list, so the relationship is unidirectional rather than bidirectional.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend provides method to retrieve weekly leaderboard based on games played in last 7 days
missing_requirements.reason: The backend main.mo file does not include a method to retrieve weekly leaderboard. Only getLeaderboard and getFriendsLeaderboard are implemented, with no time-based filtering for weekly data.

missing_requirements.requirement: Top players preview shows top 5 users by score on Home Page
missing_requirements.reason: The HomePage component file is not included in the diff summary, so implementation of the top players preview section cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer includes social media links and contact information
missing_requirements.reason: Footer.tsx includes social links but they all point to generic URLs (facebook.com, twitter.com, etc.) rather than actual Arcade Arena social profiles, and contact email is a placeholder.

missing_requirements.requirement: Show each friend's most recent game score and game type
missing_requirements.reason: FriendsPage displays friend profiles but does not show the most recent game score or game type for each friend. The GameResult data is stored in backend but not exposed or displayed per friend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Weekly leaderboard displays top players from last 7 days
missing_requirements.reason: LeaderboardPage is not included in the diff, and backend lacks weekly leaderboard method, so this tab cannot be implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Updated profile data saves to backend and profile page refreshes
missing_requirements.reason: EditProfileModal shows a placeholder toast message 'Profile update feature coming soon!' indicating the save functionality is not implemented. Backend also lacks an update method.
